byline.original: By ROBERT P. POST Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: German planes scattered over Kent by new Brit tactics; London has 3 alarms; Brit claim 42 German, 13 Brit planes downed; southeast coast, Wales and Midlands bombed; Germans claim mil objectives hit; claim 86 Brit, 23 German planes downed; Berlin reaction to Goebbels s; German air transports, Junkers-89's, reptd over Eng
snippet: LONDON, Tuesday, Sept. 3-- What is coming to be the familiar pattern of German air raids over England was repeated yesterday and during the night....

headline.main: ATTACK UP THAMES; Germans Press Steady Drive From Southeast at British Capital BIG FORMATIONS BROKEN R.A.F. Fighters Scatter Foe Over Kent--Bombs Hit Widespread Areas

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Tuesday, Sept. 3-- What is coming to be the familiar pattern of German air raids over England was repeated yesterday and during the night.
